about_the_game:
Driven Affairs is an multipathed Adult Visual Novel. You play as a chauffeur, providing luxury car-service to a list of wealthy and well connected clients. In the course of your services, you come into the employ of a number of beautiful women, all hiding some kind of secret.

As you are gradually drawn into the provocative lives and lusty affairs of your sultry clientele, you will be able to take different paths, pursue various romances, and make choices that will have an impact on the outcome of the story. Choose carefully, for any decision you make can have long reaching consequences, and opening one door, will close another.



If you are intrigued by a grounded, mature, and complex Adult Visual Novel, with characters that behave and act like adults, exquisitely drawn 2D artwork with a unique flare and style, and a complex and enticing story, check out Driven Affairs!

Characters




A prim, proper, well but together blue blooded woman… or so it seems. Intent on making a name for herself beyond the shadow of her rich and successful father, she also harbors deep, carnal desires. She is looking to feed her feverish ambitions… and her lust.



The buxom, raven-haired mogul of the largest and most successful marketing and adult entertainment company in the world, Alta Classe. Stella Morre sits on the throne of an erotic empire. The woman’s influence runs far and deep, and she has the power to make a person… or destroy them. A dangerous enemy… or a powerful ally.



The age old story of the quiet, small town girl who came to the big city to follow her dreams. But there are more salacious and provocative pages to this fable than your traditional fairy tale. Beyond her sweet and naive demeanor, this woman hides a dark and depraved secret.



A busty, blonde bombshell. She is a fitness fanatic, spending hours at the gym, maintaining a body that would be the envy of a greek god… or a porn star.
But there is more to this golden trophy wife than working out. Underneath her well put together exterior, this Gym Bunny longs for something more than just being another luxury acquisition for her indifferent and absent husband.



A dark, curvy, mysterious vixen. Born into poverty, Jessica used her beauty and cunning to climb the social ladder all the way up to the upper crust of Manhattan high society.
But how much is enough? With her wealthy husband now under investigation for headline making criminal activity, her whole life should be turned upside down. But there’s more going on with this dusky, enigmatic beauty than meets the eye.



With wits as sharp as her legs are long, she’s forsaken the trappings of a traditional life to follow her own path. A free spirit, eager to indulge in all of life’s pleasures. A chance encounter puts the two of you on a collision course. Where this modern day nomad’s story will take you, is for you to decide.

Features
-6 main character routes
-50+ Animated sex scenes
-150+ Illustrated scenes
-Replay Gallery
-HD 1080p & fullscreen option
-Steam Achievements
-Original Soundtrack and Audio
-Various female side characters
